description: Thanks, it looks great but I couldn't find United States in the countries list. Also I couldn't change the language to English.
no option to stop notification before prayer time

this app has a lot of potential, i believe it may be very good in the future, what i really don't like is that there is no hide option, the menu scrolling sensitivity is high, and cities are all in turkish
summary: it's good, but it could be better

description:
Peace be with you
Morocco is not in the Country list

Good morning / afternoon or evening depends on when you can see this, 
Thank you soooooooooooooo much for such a lightweight app that we all need, 
However, we need you to improve the following parts to make it perfect
 
1- The country list is NOT complete 

2- The city list does NOT change to the selected country, it still shows Turkish cities. 

3- I have collected the most reliable names of Fajr and Isha' calculation method so you can include it and the app to make sure it can be used worldwide, here they are:

- Egyptian General Survey Authority (Egyptian General Authority of Survey)

- Islamic Society of North America

- Muslim World League

- Umm Al-Qura University

- University of Islamic Sciences, Karachi

- Union of Islamic Organisations in France

- Fajr & Isha Twilight Angles

- Fajr Twilight Angle & Isha Minutes After Maghrib

- Fajr sunrise minutes & Isha twilight angle

- Fajr & Isha minutes

- Fajr & Isha times from observation

Thank you soooooooooooo much for your great work and we look forward to the new Enhanced Edition.

God bless you and your family 🍀
summary: Incomplete Country and City Lists plus Calculation Methods
